casebody.data:
AZIGE, et al.
v.
HOLY TRINITY ETHIOPIAN ORTHODOX TEWAHDO CHURCH, et al. 368P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Sinead Noelle O'Doherty, Attorney at Law. Matthew F. Tilley, Attorney at Law, Julian H. Wright, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Kassahun, Tassew. Forrest A. Norman, Attorney at Law. John T. Holden, Attorney at Law, Joseph L. Nelson, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Christopher M. Vann, Attorney at Law, Matthews, for Azige, Animaw, et al. Earl N. 'Trey' Mayfield, III, Attorney at Law, F. Hill Allen, IV, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Gashareba, Tesfa. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of November 2016 by Defendant (Kassahun) to Dismiss Plaintiffs' Claims Against Defendant Kassahun Without Prejudice: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017." Ervin, J. recused
